job.title: Software System Test Engineer
job.description: pstrongDescriptionnbspstrongppThe 5G Software team develops software for the next generation of modems The test engineer will work closely with software systems and firmware engineers to develop test cases test tools and test environments with a specific focus on automationnbsppolliMS in Electrical Engineering Computer Science or related fieldliliScripting experience specifically in Perl andor PythonliliTest methodologies debug and test developmentliliSoftware development in a realtime environment including data structures and OS conceptsliliWireless communication systems or DSPliolpstrongPreferred QualificationsstrongpolliRelevant experience with system testliliExperience in wireless communication and embedded devicesliliExperience with communications systems including both physical and upper layers and knowledge in evaluating wireless communications systems through log analysis isolating issuesliol
